name: Red
description: Represents power, passion, love, courage, and confidence. In some cultures like China, red symbolizes luck and celebration.

name: Pink
description: Symbolizes gentleness, romance, and innocence. It often evokes feelings of nurturing and comfort.

name: White
description: Stands for purity, cleanliness, simplicity, and new beginnings.

name: Gray
description: Represents neutrality, calmness, stability, and sophistication.

name: Black
description: Represents mystery, authority, elegance, and sometimes grief.

name: Green
description: Symbolizes nature, freshness, balance, and growth.

name: Light Green
description: Associated with softness, youthfulness, and new beginnings.

name: Orange
description: Symbolizes fun, enthusiasm, creativity, and energy.

name: Yellow
description: Associated with happiness, brightness, positivity, and intellect.

name: Blue
description: Represents calmness, confidence, intelligence, and trust.

name: Navy Blue
description: Associated with depth, authority, and reliability.

name: Purple
description: Symbolizes mystery, creativity, luxury, and spirituality.
